sentences.english: The Temple of Heaven has been converted into a park that is popular both with tourists and locals.
sentences.chinese: 天坛开放为公园后十分手国内外游客的喜爱。

sentences.english: We went to Tiantan Park last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上周我们去天坛公园了。

sentences.english: Temple of Heaven in Beijing, the city's southeast.
sentences.chinese: 天坛在原北京外城的东南部。

sentences.english: It has now been regarded the famous ritual architecture in Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 天坛大佛现已成为香港著名的宗教建筑物。

sentences.english: Tianqiao is located in Xuanwu District, with the Temple of Heaven to its east.
sentences.chinese: 天桥位于城南的宣武区，东面就是天坛公园。

sentences.english: The Summer Palace is the most beautiful park in Beijing. The Temple of Heaven and the Great Wall are worth visiting.
sentences.chinese: 颐和园是北京最美丽的公园，天坛和长城都值得一去。

sentences.english: The Danish teaching assistants visit Forbidden City and Temple of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦助教参观故宫博物馆和天坛公园。

sentences.english: I’d like to go to the Temple of Heaven and the Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 那我就上午带您去故宫，然后去天坛。

sentences.english: Interior of The Temple of Heaven complex is shown in Beijing, on Jan. 14.
sentences.chinese: 这张展示的是1月14日北京天坛内部的复杂结构。

sentences.english: Therefore, there was also a Hall of Abstinence inside the Forbidden City.
sentences.chinese: 所以故宫里也有斋宫，但与天坛的颜色完全不一样。

sentences.english: Then he began tossing them onto people’s heads at Temple of Heaven Park.
sentences.chinese: 之后他就开始来天坛公园向人们头顶抛这些圈。

sentences.english: Perhaps we can go to the Temple of HeavenPark.
sentences.chinese: 也许我们能去天坛公园。

sentences.english: Tiantan (the Temple Heaven), first built in 1420, is a masterpiece of traditional Chinese architecture.
sentences.chinese: 天坛首建于1420年，是中国建筑的一个典范。

sentences.english: The temple of heaven in Beijing is located in Beijing, in the southeast of Beijing WaiCheng.
sentences.chinese: 北京天坛地处北京，在原北京外城的东南部。

sentences.english: The Temple of Heaven reflects an ordered cosmos.
sentences.chinese: 天坛的建筑反映了宇宙的规律。

sentences.english: Among the uniquely constructed temples stands the Whispering Wall.
sentences.chinese: 围绕在天坛独特建筑四周的是回音壁。

definition: Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
Tiananmen Gate, entrance of the Imperial City in Beijing
Hall of Supreme Harmony, the largest of the three halls that constitute the heart of the Outer Court of the Forbidden City 紫禁城[Zi3 jin4 cheng2]
the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Shichahai, scenic area of northwest Beijing with three lakes
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
Tower of Buddhist Incense in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
Longevity Hill in the Summer Palace 頤和園|颐和园[Yi2 he2 yuan2], Beijing
the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)
